'''Hildifons Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].
==History==
Hildifons was the sixth of the twelve children of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]]. He went on a journey outside [[the Shire]] and never returned.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>  When [[Bilbo Baggins]] was young he used to pester [[Gandalf]] for information about [[Hobbits]] who had "gone off", such as his uncle Hildifons.<ref>{{UT|Erebor}}, Appendix</ref>

==Etymology==
The name contains ''hild'' "battle" and ''fons'' "ready".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
